channel.title: North Country Escape
channel.description: Recent content on North Country Escape

item.description: Santa’s Village in the Winter Quick Tips Santa’s Village is only open for a limited number of days around the holidays. Make sure to get tickets well ahead of time from the Santa’s Village site. Get there close to opening. It gets dark early and it gets busier around 3PM when folks with discount tickets are allowed in. Go see Santa ASAP. That line is not going to get shorter.
